channel.description: Recent content on event-logging XML Schema

item.title: News: Version 4.0-beta.5
item.description:
For a detailed list of the changes in v4.0-beta.5 see the

changelog

v4.0 of the Schema is marked as beta while the changes made since v3 are tested with real event data. We do not anticipate any change to the Schema unless problems are found in testing.

item.title: News: New Documentation Site
item.description:
The Schema documentation has been re-vamped with a new look and feel. The documentation is now versioned so that you are only reading documentation applicable to one minor version of the schema.

Other improvements:

  • Addtion of News and Releases sections
  • Better site and page navigation with the left and right hand menus
  • Tagging of content to help find related material
